author: nintendox1856
content: guys, please explain this case. A developer sold 10k copies of his erc1155 through his website (minting). Now he is planing a drop of new 10k of erc721 tokens to all holders of erc1155 copies. Please explain, what will be his gas expenses? I heard they can be much lower comparing with the case if he sold 10k erc721 tokens throughout his website directly (especially in a short period of time)
